verbose_text: It should also be noted that, when citicoline is encapsulated in liposomes, the CEST signal of liposomal citicoline is lower than its free form because a single-compartment CEST now is replaced by a compartmental exchange model, in which both the exchange rate of the CEST agents encapsulated in the liposomes and the exchange rate of water molecules across the membrane (typically 10 2 - 10 3 Hz) XREF_BIBR contribute jointly to the apparent CEST signal.
